description.p: The air around this staff crackles with a cold, frosty wind - a power that has been divided for too long, and is waiting to be released.

p.indent: Heart of Ice: When dealing cold damage, the wielder deals an additional 1 Cold Damage.
Insidious Cold: Upon dealing cold damage, the creature will roll a D4. On a 2 or lower the creature is Chilled, resulting in double cold damage dealt to the target.

description.p: This weathered quarterstaff appears to be an ordinary piece of driftwood, its surface smoothed by years of ocean currents. However, upon closer inspection, faint carvings of waves and spiraling patterns run along its length, glowing softly with a pale blue light when exposed to moonlight or water. The staff exudes a calming presence, as if imbued with the rhythm of the tides.
This staff can cast Create / Destroy Water once per day, and allows for the casting of Control Water.
The attuned staff can be used as a spellcasting focus while being held, providing a +1 bonus to attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your cantrips.
In addition, when a summoner is attuned to this staff, the limit to the number of creatures they can control is increased by the staff’s bonus.
Rare Variant. The staff provides a +2 bonus to attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your cantrips.
Very Rare Variant. The staff provides a +3 bonus to attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your cantrips.
Legendary Variant. The staff provides a +3 bonus to attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your cantrips. In addition, summons add the staff’s bonus to their damage rolls.
